subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Yogi Ferrell scored 27 points for Indiana, upsetting No. 10 Michigan, and breathed new life into its N.C.A.A. tournament aspirations.
snippet: Yogi Ferrell scored 27 points for Indiana, upsetting No. 10 Michigan, and breathed new life into its N.C.A.A. tournament aspirations.
